0.3.2.name: wordpress/related-posts
0.3.2.description: Adding related posts to the bottom of your posts makes your creations feel more authoritative and credible. Related posts help your readers find other interesting content and it gets you the attention from the authors you’ve linked to. Give exposure, get exposure. A line of related posts goes a long way.
